question: NBA: Milwaukee Bucks vs. Phoenix Suns 2023-02-26
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for February 26 at 1:00 PM:

If the Milwaukee Bucks win, the market will resolve to “Bucks”.

If the Phoenix Suns win, the market will resolve to “Suns”.

 If the game is not completed by April 16, 2023 (11:59:59 PM EST), the market will resolve 50-50.
